Description: Fragment of the lid of the granodiorite outer-coffin of Merymose, Viceroy of Kush during the reign of his father, Amenhotep III.
Curator's comments: Published: PM I Part 1: p. 436 HTBM Part 8: Plates XVIII-XIX P. Kozloff, B. Bryan, and M. Berman, Egypt's Dazzling Sun, Cleveland 1992, pp.320-321 [64] = Le Pharaon-Soleil, Paris 1993, pp.279-280 [64]. Art and Afterlife in Ancient Egypt, Japan 1999-2000, [26]; N. Strudwick, Masterpieces of Ancient Egypt, London 2006, pp. 168-9.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Albert Edward John Spencer, 7th Earl Spencer
